channel.title: Drops
channel.description: How can i make Chaos elemental and Giant mole drop items... please help.. (sorry if im such a noob lol)

item.title: Drops
item.dc:creator: @Str3ngthzzz Str3ngthzzz
item.description:
@Str3ngthzzz wrote:

sh999:

How can i make Chaos elemental and Giant mole drop items… please help… (sorry if im such a noob lol)

lol, i think i can help, open NPCHandler.Java and search for if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50) {
now right below the end of that code }add this if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPC) { ItemHandler.addItem(4206, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }
where it says, npcType == NPC)" change the NPC to the npc ID of the chaos elemental. And the 4206 is the ID of what the chaos elemental will drop, change that to w/e id you want it to drop.

Read full topic
